```{r}
library(shiny)
library(fmsb)

# Define UI
ui <- fluidPage(
  titlePanel("Basketball Skills Radar Chart"),
  sidebarLayout(
    sidebarPanel(
      h3("Player 1 Stats"),
      sliderInput("shooting", "Shooting", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      sliderInput("passing", "Passing", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      sliderInput("defense", "Defense", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      sliderInput("rebounding", "Rebounding", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      h3("Player 2 Stats"),
      sliderInput("shooting2", "Shooting 2", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      sliderInput("passing2", "Passing 2", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      sliderInput("defense2", "Defense 2", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50),
      sliderInput("rebounding2", "Rebounding 2", min = 1, max = 100, value = 50)
    ),
    mainPanel(
      plotOutput("radarPlot", width = "700px", height = "700px") # Increase size here
    )
  )
)

# Define server logic
server <- function(input, output) {
  
  output$radarPlot <- renderPlot({
    # Data for radar chart
    data <- data.frame(
      Shooting = c(100, 0, input$shooting, input$shooting2),
      Passing = c(100, 0, input$passing, input$passing2),
      Defense = c(100, 0, input$defense, input$defense2),
      Rebounding = c(100, 0, input$rebounding, input$rebounding2)
    )
    
    # Plot radar chart
    radarchart(data, 
               axistype = 1, 
               pcol = c("blue", "red"), 
               pfcol = c(rgb(0.2, 0.5, 0.7, 0.5), rgb(0.8, 0.3, 0.3, 0.5)), 
               plwd = 2, 
               cglcol = "grey", 
               cglty = 1, 
               axislabcol = "black", 
               caxislabels = seq(0, 100, 25), 
               cglwd = 0.8)
  })
}

# Run the application 
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
